tiles.name: Polar Bears
tiles.description: See polar bears returning to the ice for the hunting season

tiles.name: Food trucks
tiles.description: JapaDog’s famous hotdogs were the original innovators in Vancouver’s now thriving fusion food truck scene

tiles.name: Foraging
tiles.description: Foraging in Newfoundland is a year-round affair, from summer’s bakeapples, to winter’s amazing variety of mushrooms
tiles.imgAlt: plate of foraged mushrooms and onions

tiles.name: Montreal Jazz festival
tiles.description: Chill with some of the coolest cats in jazz at Montreal’s world-renowned international festival

tiles.name: Shellfish festival
tiles.description: Oyster-shuckers and chowder champions sharpen their knives at P.E.I.’s annual Shellfish Festival

tiles.name: White water rafting
tiles.description: The Kicking Horse River runs through the Rocky Mountains of Alberta and B.C., offering some of Canada’s best whitewater rafting

tiles.name: First nations
tiles.description: Discover the rich history and cultural influence of Canada’s First Nations

tiles.name: Lobster
tiles.description: Fresh, sustainable Atlantic lobster from Nova Scotia, New Brunswick and P.E.I. can be found across Canada, year-round

tiles.name: Calgary stampede
tiles.description: Hitch your wagons and roll on up to the world-famous Calgary Stampede

tiles.name: Moose safari
tiles.description: For an excellent chance of sighting moose, take an early morning or evening paddle

tiles.name: Spirit bear
tiles.description: Spirit, or Kermode, bears are a rare white subspecies of the more common black bear

tiles.name: Icebergs
tiles.description: Iceberg Alley offers iceberg hunters the chance to view 10,000-year-old sparkling giants

tiles.name: Grizzly bears
tiles.description: The Great Bear rainforest  – home to B.C.’s largest grizzly population – stretches along 250 miles of the central and northern coast

tiles.name: Canoeing
tiles.description: Canoeing is the perfect way to explore Canada’s wilderness, and leave the rest of the world far behind

tiles.name: Ranch life
tiles.description: The historic Reesor ranch offers a taste of what life was really like for Canada’s prairie pioneers

tiles.name: Salmon snorkelling
tiles.description: Snorkel with thousands of salmon returning to spawn in the pristine waters of the Campbell river

tiles.name: Northern Lights
tiles.description: Yellowknife’s winter night skies play host to the breathtaking northern lights (aurora borealis)

tiles.name: Toronto International Film Festival
tiles.description: September’s annual Toronto International Film Festival is second only to Cannes in terms of influence

tiles.name: Whales
tiles.description: Many whale-watching tours available from Vancouver guarantee orca sightings during peak season

tiles.name: Wine
tiles.description: The vineyards of British Columbia are a wine-lover’s paradise

tiles.name: Sushi
tiles.description: Sustainable sushi is one of a Vancouver's specialties - fresh, beautiful, and delicious

tiles.name: Dark Sky Festival
tiles.description: Viewing the night sky at the annual Jasper Dark Sky festival takes stargazing to a magical level

tiles.name: Beluga whales
tiles.description: Thousands of beautiful belugas visit Manitoba in summer, their distinctive whistles earning them the nickname “canaries of the sea”

tiles.name: Lodge Life
tiles.description: Tucked away in the wilds of the Great Bear rainforest, Nimmo bay offers top-quality fishing, boating and wildlife viewing from May to October
